list_definition.definition: a person who is not part of a group etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She always felt like an outsider at school.

list_definition.mean_english: người ít có khả năng thắng cuộc
list_definition.definition: (in a race etc) a runner who is not expected to win

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The race was won by a complete outsider.
